docs.title: Home
docs.text:
Yaml Sticky Notes Visualize, organize, and manage ideas effortlessly. LAUNCH APP Unleash the power of YAML for your ideas. This tool simplifies the visualization of your concepts, making it an ideal companion for creating user story maps, organizing ideas, etc.

  • It's just yaml

    Focus on your ideas with simple operations that anyone can use easily.

  • Ease of Editing

    With a text-based format, adding, deleting, and rearranging items is easy.

  • Version Control

    Integrated with Git, you can manage history.

Your support will help us improve the app and reach more people. We sincerely appreciate it!
